svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Net enrolment rate, boys vs. girls in pre-primary education, 2014 to 2015
The net enrolment rate in pre-primary education for boys versus girls. This is calculated as the total number of male
or female students in the theoretical age group for pre-primary education who are enroled, as a percentage of the
total male or female population of that age group.
